properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')BOARD_DT FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_CD = 3
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')BOARD_DT FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_CD = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_CD DESC
SELECT EVENT_NO,EVENT_TITLE,EVENT_IMG FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_ST = 'N' ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
SELECT EVENT_NO,EVENT_TITLE,EVENT_IMG FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
